-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local UnityEngine = UnityEngine
System.namespace("DCET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("CameraComponentAwakeSystem", function (namespace)
    local Awake
    Awake = function (this, self)
      self:Awake()
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.DCET.AwakeSystem_1(out.DCET.CameraComponent)
        }
      end,
      Awake = Awake,
      __metadata__ = function (out)
        return {
          class = { 0x6, out.DCET.ObjectSystemAttribute() }
        }
      end
    }
  end)

  namespace.class("CameraComponentLateUpdateSystem", function (namespace)
    local LateUpdate
    LateUpdate = function (this, self)
      self:LateUpdate()
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.DCET.LateUpdateSystem_1(out.DCET.CameraComponent)
        }
      end,
      LateUpdate = LateUpdate,
      __metadata__ = function (out)
        return {
          class = { 0x6, out.DCET.ObjectSystemAttribute() }
        }
      end
    }
  end)

  namespace.class("CameraComponent", function (namespace)
    local getMainCamera, Awake, LateUpdate, UpdatePosition, __ctor__
    __ctor__ = function (this)
      System.base(this).__ctor__(this)
    end
    getMainCamera = function (this)
      return this.mainCamera
    end
    Awake = function (this)
      this.mainCamera = UnityEngine.Camera.getmain()
    end
    LateUpdate = function (this)
      -- 摄像机每帧更新位置
      UpdatePosition(this)
    end
    UpdatePosition = function (this)
      local cameraPos = this.mainCamera:gettransform():getposition()
      this.mainCamera:gettransform():setposition(UnityEngine.Vector3(this.Unit:getPosition().x, cameraPos.y, this.Unit:getPosition().z - 1))
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.DCET.Entity
        }
      end,
      getMainCamera = getMainCamera,
      Awake = Awake,
      LateUpdate = LateUpdate,
      __ctor__ = __ctor__
    }
  end)
end)
